name: Canix
long_description:
Canix is building the first generation of modern software for the burgeoning cannabis industry. We help our customers overcome daunting compliance regulation, sell more product, and optimize their day to day operationsâ€”from cultivation, to processing, to distribution.

Recent winner of TechCrunch Disrupt 2020, find out more at TechCrunch and canix.com.
one_liner: Canix makes it easy to get and stay compliant as a cannabis business.
